channel.title: git on 江小凡的博客
channel.description: Recent content in git on 江小凡的博客

item.title: Git
item.description: git 一些实用的做法 长期更新 git branch -r git branch --track [branch] [remote-branch] git branch --set-upstream [branch] [remote-branch] # 删除分支 $ git branch -d [branch-name] git branch -r -d origin/branch-name # 删除分支 git push origin :branch-name # 删除远程分支 $ git push origin --delete [branch-name] $ git branch -dr [remote/branch] # 显示
